title: Vampire - Bloodlines (BEEWAA! Edition)
description: Great RPG crippled by bugs at release.  Fixed by the gaming community.  This version includes all the patches (official & unoffical) as well as the widescreen resolution patcher.  This patcher is included in the "Bin" folder, a file called "vtmbrespatcher.exe".  This will allow you to patch the game to run at your LCD&#039;s native widescreen resolution.  Anyway, enjoy!  DAMN Activision for making them release this early.  It could have been the mother of all RPG&#039;s!!!!!
